paragraphs.title: Convert CSV To Parquet
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.sql.types._


// 메모 데이터를 구조체 정의
val schema= StructType(Array(
                            StructField("memo_seq_id",        StringType,true),
                            StructField("psr_cust_id",        StringType,true),
                            StructField("memo_ymd",           StringType,true),
                            StructField("memotype1",          StringType,true),
                            StructField("memotype2",          StringType,true),
                            StructField("memo",               StringType,true)
                            )
                        )

// 메모 데이터 RDD 생성
val rawcsv = sqlContext.read.format("csv")
                            .schema(schema)
                            .option("delimiter","|")
                            .option("nullValue","")
                            .option("treatEmptyValuesAsNulls","true")
                            .load("hdfs://team301.hadoop.com:8020/pilot-pjt/collect/memo-batch-log/wrk_date=20170725/P_MEMO_V1.0.log")
                         

                        
//Parquet으로 저장(id/memo가 null  경우 오류 발생함-방지용 filter추가)
rawcsv.filter("memo_seq_id is not null and memo is not null").write.mode("overwrite").parquet("hdfs://team301.hadoop.com:8020/pilot-pjt/collect/memo-batch-log/wrk_date=20170725/P_MEMO_V1.0.parq")


//rawcsv.write.mode("overwrite").parquet("hdfs://team301.hadoop.com:8020/pilot-pjt/collect/memo-batch-log/wrk_date=20170725/P_MEMO_V3.0.parq")

rawcsv: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [memo_seq_id: string, psr_cust_id: string ... 4 more fields]
mdata: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [memo_seq_id: string, psr_cust_id: string ... 4 more fields]

paragraphs.title: 정규표현식으로 개인정보 필터
paragraphs.text:
//mdata.select($"memo_seq_id",regexp_extract($"memo","[0-9]{6}[0-9]{7}",0)).show()
//mdata.select($"memo_seq_id",regexp_extract($"memo","[0-9]{13}",0)).show()
//mdata.select($"memo_seq_id",regexp_extract($"memo","[0-9]{6}-[0-9]{7}",1)).show()
/*
//원데이터
mdata.show
카드번호 제거
val t1 = mdata.select($"memo_seq_id",regexp_replace($"memo","[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{4}","xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx").alias("memo"))
           .select($"memo_seq_id",regexp_replace($"memo","[0-9]{16}","xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx").alias("memo"))
t1.collect()


// 주민번호 제거
val t2= t1.select($"memo_seq_id",regexp_replace(regexp_replace($"memo","[0-9]{13}","XXXXXXXXXXXXX"),"[0-9]{6}-[0-9]{7}","XXXXXX-XXXXXXX").alias("memo"))
// 이메일 제거
//t1.select($"memo_seq_id",regexp_extract($"memo","(\\w+\\.)*\\w+@(\\w+\\.)+[A-Za-z]+",0).alias("memo")).show()
val t3 = t2.select($"memo_seq_id",regexp_replace($"memo","(\\w+\\.)*\\w+@(\\w+\\.)+[A-Za-z]+","xxxxx@xxx.com").alias("memo"))

// 전화번호 제거
val t4 = t3.select($"memo_seq_id",regexp_replace($"memo","\\d{2,3}-\\d{3,4}-\\d{4}","xxx-xxxx-xxxx").alias("memo"))
           .select($"memo_seq_id",regexp_replace($"memo","[0-9]{2,3}-[0-9]{3,4}-[0-9]{4}","xxx-xxxx-xxxx").alias("memo"))
           .select($"memo_seq_id",regexp_replace($"memo","[0-9]{2,3}-[0-9]{3,4}[0-9]{4}","xxx-xxxx-xxxx").alias("memo"))
           .select($"memo_seq_id",regexp_replace($"memo","[0-9]{2,3}\\s[0-9]{3,4}-[0-9]{4}","xxx-xxxx-xxxx").alias("memo"))
           .select($"memo_seq_id",regexp_replace($"memo","[0-9]{2,3}[0-9]{3,4}[0-9]{4}","xxx-xxxx-xxxx").alias("memo"))
           .select($"memo_seq_id",regexp_replace($"memo","[0-9]{2,3}\\s[0-9]{3,4}\\s[0-9]{4}","xxx-xxxx-xxxx").alias("memo"))
t4.show()

val mdata_reg=t4
*/

//원데이터
mdata.show
//카드번호 제거
val t1 = mdata.select($"memo_seq_id",$"psr_cust_id",$"memo_ymd",$"memotype1",$"memotype2",regexp_replace($"memo","[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{4}","xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx").alias("memo"))
              .select($"memo_seq_id",$"psr_cust_id",$"memo_ymd",$"memotype1",$"memotype2",regexp_replace($"memo","[0-9]{16}","xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx").alias("memo"))
              .select($"memo_seq_id",$"psr_cust_id",$"memo_ymd",$"memotype1",$"memotype2",regexp_replace(regexp_replace($"memo","[0-9]{13}","XXXXXXXXXXXXX"),"[0-9]{6}-[0-9]{7}","XXXXXX-XXXXXXX").alias("memo"))
              .select($"memo_seq_id",$"psr_cust_id",$"memo_ymd",$"memotype1",$"memotype2",regexp_replace($"memo","(\\w+\\.)*\\w+@(\\w+\\.)+[A-Za-z]+","xxxxx@xxx.com").alias("memo"))
              .select($"memo_seq_id",$"psr_cust_id",$"memo_ymd",$"memotype1",$"memotype2",regexp_replace($"memo","\\d{2,3}-\\d{3,4}-\\d{4}","xxx-xxxx-xxxx").alias("memo"))
              .select($"memo_seq_id",$"psr_cust_id",$"memo_ymd",$"memotype1",$"memotype2",regexp_replace($"memo","[0-9]{2,3}-[0-9]{3,4}-[0-9]{4}","xxx-xxxx-xxxx").alias("memo"))
              .select($"memo_seq_id",$"psr_cust_id",$"memo_ymd",$"memotype1",$"memotype2",regexp_replace($"memo","[0-9]{2,3}-[0-9]{3,4}[0-9]{4}","xxx-xxxx-xxxx").alias("memo"))
              .select($"memo_seq_id",$"psr_cust_id",$"memo_ymd",$"memotype1",$"memotype2",regexp_replace($"memo","[0-9]{2,3}\\s[0-9]{3,4}-[0-9]{4}","xxx-xxxx-xxxx").alias("memo"))
              .select($"memo_seq_id",$"psr_cust_id",$"memo_ymd",$"memotype1",$"memotype2",regexp_replace($"memo","[0-9]{2,3}[0-9]{3,4}[0-9]{4}","xxx-xxxx-xxxx").alias("memo"))
              .select($"memo_seq_id",$"psr_cust_id",$"memo_ymd",$"memotype1",$"memotype2",regexp_replace($"memo","[0-9]{2,3}\\s[0-9]{3,4}\\s[0-9]{4}","xxx-xxxx-xxxx").alias("memo"))
           
           
t1.write.mode("overwrite").parquet("hdfs://team301.hadoop.com:8020/pilot-pjt/collect/memo-batch-log/wrk_date=20170725/P_MEMO_REGEXP.parq")


val mdata_reg=t1

paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.sql.functions._
import com.github.uosdmlab.nkp.Analyzer

val df = spark.createDataset(
	Seq(
		"아버지가방에들어가신다.",
		"자주 가요 백화점!",
		"데이터는 재밌어",
		"학교종이 땡땡땡 어서모이자"
	)
).toDF("text")
	.withColumn("id", monotonically_increasing_id)

val analyzer = new Analyzer

val result = analyzer.transform(df)

result.show(truncate = false)
